text.tspan: The definition of the types of the
The a_position in the shader is an attribute. This parameter has the type GL_FLOAT_VEC3 and semantic "POSITION"
The u_lightDirection is a uniform. This parameter has the type GL_FLOAT_VEC3 and a default value
The u_modelViewMatrix is a uniform. This parameter has the type GL_FLOAT_MAT4 and semantic "MODELVIEW"
